questionWord: When Jeffery doesn’t feel like cooking, he often orders pizza online and has it ______ to his house.
After watching a TV program on natural history, Adam decided to go on a ______ for dinosaur fossils in South Dakota.
Hidden deep in a small alley among various tiny shops, the entrance of the Michelin star restaurant is barely ______ to passersby.
Peter is afraid of the dark. He even leaves ______ the on when sleeping.
You were ______ not to lend Amy money. She never gives back what she borrows.
Although it took me lots of time ______ a big meal for ten people, I was happy that everyone enjoyed it.
The ______ is so strong today that my hair keeps blowing in the air.
The woman who lives next door to Ken is a ______ to him. They have never met and he doesn’t even know her name.
The factory has been throwing trash into the river for years. Now ______ must be taken to stop this.
Elderly shoppers in this store are advised to take the elevator rather than the _____, which may move too fast for them to keep their balance.
The skydiver managed to land safely after jumping out of the aircraft, even though her _____ failed to open in midair.
The 2011 Nobel Peace Prize was awarded _____ to three women for the efforts they made in fighting for women’s rights.
The non-profit organization has _____ $1 million over five years to finance the construction of the medical center.
Since many of our house plants are from humid jungle environments, they need _____ air to keep them green and healthy.
Upon hearing its master’s call, the dog wagged its tail, and followed her out of the room _____.
